```{r}
source("SetUp.R")
```

Load Data
```{r}
data("knz_bison")
```

Create a column that calculates age
```{r}
knz_bison <- knz_bison %>%
  mutate(age = as.numeric(format(Sys.Date(), "%Y")) - rec_year)
```

Write a function to filter dataset based on weight threshold
```{r}
weight_subset <- function(knz_bison, animal_weight, min_weight, max_weight) {
  animal_weight <- enquo(animal_weight)
  knz_bison %>%
    filter((!!animal_weight) >= min_weight & (!!animal_weight) <= max_weight)
}
```

Testing function
```{r}
subset_table <- weight_subset(knz_bison, animal_weight,800,815 )
```

Create a boxplot showing weight distribution between male and female bison, conduct a t-test

```{r}
ggplot(knz_bison, aes(x = animal_sex, y = animal_weight, fill = animal_sex)) +
  geom_boxplot() 

t_test(knz_bison, formula =animal_weight ~ animal_sex)
```
